divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving south on Grand Avenue, Baldwin NY, when I noticed a green flash to my left. Initially I thought it was a reflection from the stop light. I slow the car down and looked up and to my left and watched as this green ball of light shot across the sky and disappeared over the trees. I turned off the main road hoping to bypass the trees, but it was gone. I expected to hear some sort of explosion but did not. I've seen strange things in the sky, but this had to be one of the most amazing! I came home and immediately accessed the internet to find out if anyone had seen anything like this in the past. I found one image that was similar, though not as large or exactly the same color. Another article describes a similar object and said it was a meteorite. I've seen shooting stars, meteor showers but nothing like the object I witnessed this evening.
